mapper.select: SELECT CUST_USER_IDX AS CUST_USER_IDX , USER_EMAIL AS USER_EMAIL , USER_ID AS USER_ID , USER_PASSWORD AS USER_PASSWORD , USER_NAME AS USER_NIKNAME , USER_AUTH AS USER_AUTH FROM CUST_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{USER_ID}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CUST_USER(USER_ID, USER_PASSWORD, USER_EMAIL, USER_NAME, USER_AUTH) VALUE ( #{userId}, #{userPassword},#{userEmail}, #{userNikName}, #{userAuth})
